web_design.title: Web Design
web_design.description: Creation of modern, responsive, and visually appealing websites, focused on performance, usability, and personalized visual identity.

api_development.title: API Development
api_development.description: Building robust and scalable APIs for servers, integrating databases and providing secure and efficient endpoints for web and mobile applications.

database.title: Database
database.description: Modeling, implementation, and optimization of relational and non-relational databases, ensuring data integrity, security, and high performance.
